content: ***about this pattern*** crochet your own easy crochet beanie using this crochet pattern in pdf format this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the finished measurements in inches are toddler child adult to fit head circumference 16-18 18-20 21-23 actual head circumference 16 18 20 5 beanie width 8 9 10 beanie length 7 7 5 8 5 the finished measurements in centimeters are toddler child adult to fit head circumference 41-46 46-51 53-58 actual head circumference 40 45 52 beanie width 20 22 5 26 beanie length 18 19 22 the printable pdf has a total of 5 pages including * info you need such as materials sizes gauge and stitches used * written pattern in us terms * instructions to change the size if desired * photos * video tutorial on youtube available as an instant download --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/easy-crochet-beanie ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg
